action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the pillow on the counter, the book on the shelf and the plate on the table.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a broom closet now. There are a mop and a broom. The mop is on the floor. The broom is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You take the mop. In your inventory you have a mop.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a living room, a hallway and a pantry here.
The cupboard is now open. In the cupboard there is a plate.
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a mop and a plate.
You can't see a table here.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a book, a table, a chair and a couch. The book is on the side table. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
You put the plate on the table.
You can't see a shelf here.
You can't go to a bedroom from here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a living room, a hallway and a pantry here.
You can't see a book here.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a plate, a book, a table, a chair and a couch. The plate is on the table. The book is on the side table. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
You can't see a shelf here.
You can't go to a pantry from here.
You can't go to a hallway from here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a living room, a hallway and a pantry here.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a plate, a book, a table, a chair and a couch. The plate is on the table. The book is on the side table. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
You can't see a shelf here.
You can't go to a bedroom from here.
You can't go to a hallway from here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a living room, a hallway and a pantry here.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a plate, a book, a table, a chair and a couch. The plate is on the table. The book is on the side table. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
You can't see a shelf here.

> go to kitchen 

(I will try to find a shelf)
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a living room, a hallway and a pantry here.
You are in a pantry now. There are a refrigerator and a freezer. The refrigerator is closed. The freezer is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a living room, a hallway and a pantry here.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a plate, a book, a table, a chair and a couch. The plate is on the table. The book is on the side table. There is a passage to a kitchen here.

> put book on shelf 

(I will try to find a shelf)
You can't see a shelf here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a living room, a hallway and a pantry here.

> go to hallway 

(I will try to find a shelf)
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You are in a bedroom now. There are a wardrobe, a shelf and a bed. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You can't see a book here.
You can't go to a living room from here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You can't go to a living room from here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a living room, a hallway and a pantry here.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a plate, a book, a table, a chair and a couch. The plate is on the table. The book is on the side table. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
You can't see a shelf here.

> take plate 

(I will move the plate to the counter)
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a mop and a plate.
You can't see a counter here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a living room, a hallway and a pantry here.
You put the plate on the counter.
You can't see a book here.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a book, a table, a chair and a couch. The book is on the side table. There is a passage to a kitchen here.

> take book 

(I will move the book to the shelf)
You take the book. In your inventory you have a mop and a book.
You can't go to a bedroom from here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard, a plate and a counter. The cupboard is open. The plate is on the counter. There are passages to a living room, a hallway and a pantry here.
